title: How to Beat the Game Bully (PS2)

steps.headline: Missions are very fun on this game.
steps.description: You'll be amazed how quickly they go by. Start out doing about five missions at a time then have some free play.

steps.headline: Once you get a like for these missions do as many as you like.
There are 5 chapters in this game.
When doing these missions think ahead of time to prevent you from failing the mission.
Once you have done the missions, you are ready to face Gary Smith.
Chase him down the roof of the school building by crossing planks and climbing ladders
Keep hitting him until he falls.

text: Missions are very fun on this game. You'll be amazed how quickly they go by. Start out doing about five missions at a time then have some free play. Once you get a like for these missions do as many as you like.  There are 5 chapters in this game. Each chapter has about 10-14 missions. When doing these missions think ahead of time to prevent you from failing the mission.  Once you have done the missions, you are ready to face Gary Smith. The "Bully" of the whole game. Chase him down the roof of the school building by crossing planks and climbing ladders  Keep hitting him until he falls. He will then be expelled!
